snippet.title: 'Indecent act' at Perth beach
snippet.content: A MAN has allegedly run towards a female jogger while committing an indecent act at a Swanbourne beach. Police said a 23-year-old woman was jogging along the beach near Alfred Road when a man approached her from bushland at about 3pm on Saturday July 22. The man ran towards her while committing an indecent act but the woman ran back towards a path and the man disappeared. Police believe the person depicted in the image may be able to assist police. He was described as between 40 to 50 years old and dark skinned, with dark eyes, a stocky build, dark beard and approximately 175cm tall. The man was wearing a red turban, green jumper and dark pants. Anyone with information should contact CrimeStoppers on 1800 333 000 or online at .
